adrFormatAddress: 1685 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: I had the pleasure of working very closely with Nelum Botantics to develop and sell products for my boutique and my yoga studio. The quality (and care) Klara takes to develop truly natural skincare is unmatched. Within each bottle, jar, and tin, she proves just how effective natural products are compared to their chemical-y counterparts. Our customers raved about their experiences, which often extended into healing ones versus ones rooted in pure grooming or vanity. On a personal note, I've never experienced skincare products that were remarkably gentle and rich all at once. Buy the salves. Explore the butters. And if you're looking for a gift for new parents, the baby oils are THEE absolute best!

originalText.text:
My face thanks Nelum Botanics for their wonderful products. The earth thanks Nelum Botanics for their care and active kindness in sourcing ingredients and packaging that is conscious of eco justice.

I LOVE using these products and I see my wrinkles and age spots take a hike and a beautiful glow emerge with each use. It may be hard to see but, at 53, I had several prominent age spots on my cheek and they are now hardly noticeable. That is just incredible to me!

My 17 year old daughter also uses the products. We both love the cleansing elixir and facial mist. I love the graceful face elixir - it is like gold. I highly recommend these products. Also the Love Samples make great gifts. Do yourself a favor and don't hesitate to order these gems.

originalText.text: Nelum Botanics is one of the only companies I know that not only uses pure organic ingredients, but these ingredients are also fair trade. When I use her products I know that I am taking care of my skin in a holistic way and also helping communities who need the help. It's no wonder that I have a wonderful sense of wellbeing after using this luscious line. Nelum Botanics is really an example of how beauty is not skin deep--it's an energy and these products are a great way to connect with the natural energy we call beauty. I regularly use the rose hydrating face mist, and the facial elixir and OMG the Nelum Botanics Rosehip & Chamomile body oil is the best body moisturizer out there. Thank you Nelum for you products. I am looking forward to trying the rest of your products!

originalText.text: I have tried dozens of elixirs, but this is something special. It has eradicated the dry patches on my face and balanced out my oily spots. Graceful Face Elixir has become part of my evening ritual, and I wake up still able to see its moisturizing and rejuvenating effects. My skin truly looks younger and healthier.

text.text: I have tried dozens of elixirs, but this is something special. It has eradicated the dry patches on my face and balanced out my oily spots. Graceful Face Elixir has become part of my evening ritual, and I wake up still able to see its moisturizing and rejuvenating effects. My skin truly looks younger and healthier.

originalText.text: I spent nearly 5 years  doing visual merchandising  for a major cosmetic retail store that begins with the letter S,  so I’ve been able to sample more than my fair share of skin care products. In my opinion, Nelum Botanic‘s quality blows away all those expensive luxury brands with its simple natural healing ingredients, soothing scents and without a list of chemicals that I cannot even pronounce. Try them and you’ll become a believer too.
